title: Flipper Zero定制固件可破解主流汽车品牌滚动码安全系统
title_translated: Flipper Zero custom solid to break down the mainstream car brand rolling code security system
summary: The Flipper Zero device can bypass rolling code security on major vehicle brands, allowing thieves to steal millions of vehicles. The attack is simple and requires only one signal capture.

title: SocGholish恶意软件通过广告工具传播 为LockBit和Evil Corp等团伙提供初始访问权限
title_translated: SocGholish malware is disseminated through advertising tools to provide initial access to groups like LockBit and Eville Corp.
summary: SocGholish malware uses traffic distribution systems like Parrot TDS and Keitaro TDS to redirect users to malicious content, with possible links to TA569, Evil Corp, LockBit, Dridex, and Raspberry Robin.

title: 黑客利用嵌入恶意JavaScript的SVG文件在Windows系统执行恶意软件
title_translated: Hackers implement malicious software in Windows using SVG files embedded in the malicious JavaScript
summary: Cybercriminals use SVG documents to carry out malicious JavaScript on Windows, embedding scripts that execute when files are opened in the browser.

title: 微软修补被阿联酋黑客利用的零日漏洞
title_translated: Microsoft fixes the zero-day loophole used by UAE hackers.
summary: Microsoft closed a zero-day loophole in its Web application framework, which was exploited by Emirates Threat organizations as part of a spying campaign in the Middle East and Africa.

title: 人工智能可能修复帮助传播了 15 年的漏洞
title_translated: The repair of artificial intelligence may have helped spread a 15-year gap.
summary: A vulnerability in a Node.js code snippet, released in 2010, allows an attacker to navigate outside the specified directory. The issue has been embedded in AI training data and affects static file servers.

title: Неизвестные хакеры взломали федеральную базу судов США
title_translated: Unknown hackers broke into the federal base of US courts
summary: Electronic system used by federal courts attacked, resulting in data leak containing confidential information.

title: Через Контур Диадок начали рассылать зловред в архиве под видом RTF
title_translated: Through the Contour Diadoc began to send malware in the archive under the guise of RTF
summary: Malware distributed through Contour Diadok via infected user computers, using standard functionality for sending documents. Malware contains executable file disguised as text document.

title: В сервисы и продукты BI.ZONE добавили ИИ-ассистента
title_translated: AI assistant added to BI.ZONE services and products
summary: AI assistant Cubi helps identify cyber incidents faster and respond to them with generative AI, speeding up initial incident analysis by 40%. SOC specialists can consult Cubi about specific alerts or incidents.

title: Nvidia: в наших чипах нет бэкдоров и килл-свитчей — и быть не должно
title_translated: Nvidia: Our chips don’t have backdoors and kill switches – and shouldn’t be
summary: Nvidia denies allegations of backdoors and kill switches in their chips, citing concerns over cybersecurity principles and multi-layered security system.

title: У ФСБ серьезные претензии к Max по защите персданных
title_translated: The FSB has serious claims Max to protect Persians
summary: The FSB has raised concerns about the security of the Max messenger, citing a lack of crypto protection and other requirements for ensuring personal data security.
